but while the beaches here aren't quite

stunning and make a perfect place for

everywhere is incredible you will find
tons of coconut trees rolling mountains
volcanoes and even a salt lake the
biggest active volcano in the world is
here called Mount cartola
the lifestyle all around Comoros is
slow-paced and laid-back so don't expect
anyone to be in a hurry quite the
contrast from where it just was in
Madagascar it's also shockingly cheap
here
five dollars for that massive fish how

because I haven't seen any other

entire country to myself the reason for
such few visitors is because getting to
the Comoros Islands is not easy there's
only a handful of flights each day
coming to Moroni and they are quite
expensive but if you ever find yourself
in the region it's worth stopping by for
a brand new experience
